subject: Football
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The Rams’ Kurt Warner, in the 1999 season, was the last quarterback to win the M.V.P. award and then lead his team to a Super Bowl title.
snippet: The Rams’ Kurt Warner, in the 1999 season, was the last quarterback to win the M.V.P. award and then lead his team to a Super Bowl title.
